name: Corona Conquerors
description: The game is a first-person shooter adventure game, based on present worldwide COVID – 19 situations. A kind of new antiviral vaccine have been developed and the main character starts with a motive to deliver the medicinal formula for the COVID -19 virus to the world health institute safely. In the path of his journey, he needs to protect himself and the vaccine from the enemies. Players control character to explore the map, find the key needed to complete the game level, and then complete the task of vaccine escort given by the game.
